thread.title: The Donald Glover Love-In Continues As Drake Heaps Praise On Him
thread.title_full: The Donald Glover Love-In Continues As Drake Heaps Praise On Him

author: Somhairle Cinnsealach
title: The Donald Glover Love-In Continues As Drake Heaps Praise On Him
text:
0 
At the age of 33, it‚Äôs fair to say that Donald Glover (who raps under the name Childish Gambino) is finally getting the respect he deserves. 
Atlanta ‚Äî the FX show he created and stars in ‚Äî is winning awards , his latest album Awaken My Love! has been lauded by critics, he‚Äôs been cast to play a young Lando Calrissian in a Star Wars spin-off, and now he‚Äôs got a co-sign from one of the world‚Äôs most famous rappers. 
Drake shared a photo of Glover sitting alongside Nineteen85, the man responsible for the beats behind some of Drake‚Äôs biggest tracks (‚ÄúHotline Bling,‚Äù‚ÄúOne Dance‚Äù) with the caption ‚ÄúVery Inspiring Humans.‚Äù A photo posted by champagnepapi (@champagnepapi) on Feb 3, 2017 at 4:17pm PST 
Drizzy didn‚Äôt give away much more than his opinion on Glover, but with his More Life playlist coming out later this year and several collaborations already confirmed for the project, it wouldn‚Äôt be crazy to assume that the two artists are working together. Having Drake‚Äôs producer in the pic only adds weight to our theory. 
Nineteen85 clearly thought the moment worth sharing. He also posted the picture to Instagram, this time with the caption ‚ÄúCulture.‚Äù A photo posted by Nineteen85 (@nineteen85_) on Feb 4, 2017 at 6:46am PST 
Drake‚Äôs appreciation for Glover isn‚Äôt exactly unique, the guy is beloved by many ‚Äî so much so, in fact, that we did some digging to see if anyone on Twitter is talking shit on one of Hollywood and Hip Hop‚Äôs fastest-rising stars. 
Sleuths that we are, we Twitter searched the phrase ‚ÄúDonald Glover sucks‚Äù and guess what we found: I know it sucks to be a Falcons fan rn but Donald Glover didn't make a show about fuckin Massachusetts. So who's the real winner, ya know? 
‚Äî Sharaan Padhy (@SharaanPadhy) February 6, 2017 The Fact Donald Glover Won't Be Releasing A New Season For Atlanta Anytime Soon Truly Sucks. 
‚Äî kealo was hereüçï (@thirty6kealo) January 29, 2017 The Fact Donald Glover Won't Be Releasing A New Season For Atlanta Anytime Soon Truly Sucks.

‚Äî 31 Average (@ItsTheBAUCE) January 12, 2017 Understandable, Donald Glover IS going to be young Lando. But that still sucks. https://t.co/Mqi30nVpa2
